summary:
•	9+ years of ICT experience in Oracle, Database, PL/SQL, Financials, Banking and Services Domain
•	Played vivid roles in projects such as Solution Architect, Conversions, Data Migrations, Designing, Development, Integrations, Rollouts, Implementation, and Testing together with teams across the Globe
•	Support Enterprise Architects with Project Start Architectures and Post Project Implementation Architecture
•	Expertise in Data Migrations and Leading Data Migration Activities
•	Expertise in Implementation and support of Oracle 11i,Oracle R12, R11 ERP Systems
•	Expertise in Implementation of Integrations with BPM Tools such as PEGA
•	Worked on Oracle Lease Management (OLM) Module extensively and have very good understanding of Oracle Financials and PEGA.
•	Techno Functional knowledge balances business issues and requirements, translate those into technical design specs and provide a sound and timely solution.
•	Strong Analytical and good communication skills with problem-solving techniques with a desire and capability to learn and adapt to new situations, teams & places in no time.
•	Experience to work with and in a Multi Cultured Environment 

Most experienced in Oracle Modules:
Oracle Lease Management (OLFM), Install Base(CSI), Service Contracts / Contracts Core (OKS/OKC/OKL), CRM Foundation (JTF), Trading Community Architecture (TCA/HZ), Accounts Receivables (AR), Accounts Payables(AP), Oracle Incentive Compensation(OIC) 
Technologies and Tools: 
•	Oracle SQL Developer
•	PL/SQL, Toad
•	UNIX
•	Expert in Performance Tuning of PL/SQL
•	BI Publisher and XML Reports
•	Oracle Reports 6i
•	Oracle Forms 6i
•	Oracle Workflows
•	Conversion and Interfaces 
•	APRO
•	HP Quality Center
•	Remedy Force
•	RCM(Rabo Cash Management)
•	Trained in Java And .net
•	Tomcat and other web servers
•	ETL Tools – IBM Data Stage, Informatica
•      Perl
•	Pega 7.1.8 – PRPC, Case Management, and BPM

profile_positions.title: Whole Sale Rural and Retail Banking

profile_positions.description:
Project: DELTA – DLL European Leasing and Transaction Application Project: Migrate and Archive all VF contract
Client : De Lage Landen International B.V.                    
A strategical decision was made in 2015 by DLL Vendor Finance BU Netherlands to make ILS/SUN as the new back office contract/financial management system.
 As a result, a program was created (DELTA) with multiple subprojects each with key major deliverables. For this project key deliverables are,
o	Migrate all VF contracts and all relevant information from OLFM into a new ILS system and VF financials from Oracle Financials into SUN
o	Deactivate and Archive all VF contracts/financials in current OLM
o	Make sure other back office contract management operations for Financial Services and US are not impacted in any way
Responsible and Key Deliverable;
o	Investigating and proposing different approaches for Deactivation and Archiving including Pros and Cons of each approach
o	Conducting Workshops with key stake holders to felicitate key functional, legal and non-functional requirements
o	Complete development for the project with the team where I was mainly responsible for all the code development, testing, performance, migration and after care. Development done in all RICE components of Oracle.
o	Align with Enterprise Architect on the Sets of Data and migration approach
o	Executing POC and leading the development team 
o	Proposing and Validating OLFM solution approach and Results
o	Validating Integrations both incoming and outgoing
o	Planning Sprints and Sprint Goals
o	Conducting functional and technical workshops together with ILS team to map OLFM and ILS processes
o	Measure Performance and provide insights for tuning such as Multi-Threading due to huge amount of data and financials involved
o	Propose Infrastructure setup to get maximum out of the batch processing
o	Look at different connections between systems from Architecture Point of View
o	Prepare Run Book for Go Live and Cutover Steps
profile_positions.title: Sr Solutions Design Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Program:  Phoenix (Previously Known as Beacon)
Project : Oracle ERP Dot Releases – 4, 5, 6, 7.1, 7.3, 7.5, 7.5.1
Client: De Lage Landen (Fully owned subsidiary of RABO Bank) NL and USA

•	Functional Modules: Oracle Lease Management (OLFM), Oracle Financials, ILS (International Lease System), Oracle Fixed Assets.
•	Software: Oracle Application 11.5.10, Toad, SQL Developer, PL/SQL, Reports 6i,Forms 6i, Workflow, OAF, Java, HTML etc.
•	Software Development Methodology: Waterfall


•	Providing solutions for business requirement and enhancements and documenting these in MD050’s
•	Involved in major development of all the dot releases which went global both for NL and US. This includes development of all the RICE components of Oracle.
•	Reviewing, testing and handling change requests related to global and country specific existing and new system customizations/enhancements
•	Support and manage User Acceptance Tests together with Test Managers and Key Business Users
•	Working closely with US and India based functional, development and DBA teams on issue resolution and development changes were required.
•	Providing after care support after each release
